K&S takes a serious stance on ensuring the health and 
safety of our customers when they use our products and 
services. Product safety considerations begin from the 
product conceptualization and development stages where 
our Program Engineering Team conducts comprehensive 
assessments of potential health and safety risks posed 
to customers, to the commercialization stage where the 
Team ensures that CE certifications are attained. All K&S 
products are CE certified meeting product safety, health 
and enviromental requirements. All standard new products 
launched are declared RoHS compliant. CUSTOMER HEALTH & SAFETY
